alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 2:59AM PST until January 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult for high profile vehicles especially along north to south roadways. Blowing and drifting snow is also possible in the higher elevations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
